editorialNotes.standard: On movie night we like to dim the lights, pop the popcorn, and check out MUBI. It puts an arthouse theater at our fingertips, adding a new film every day from an eclectic library of stunning world cinema. The simple interface makes it a pleasure to discover cult classics, eye-opening documentaries, and hard-to-find dramas we might’ve missed.
editorialNotes.short: Discover cult classics, eye-opening docs and hard-to-find dramas.
